main: A world of balance. A world without Demon Lords or Ashura Kings. One where man does not fight to seek demonic power.
Yes! You see!? Disparity is the original sin of this world. We can bring about a UNITY that this world has never seen.
Ushered into a new age, with us at its helm.
I should've known YOU would come up with this sort of nonsense.
That a demon would be so bold as to speak of 'peace'
Old man. You were more like a father to me than the Daimaou himself. If I've erred in your eyes, then you have only your upbringing to blame.
I would've thought that maybe your human blood would have given you some semblance of sensibility.
But to think, that you wish to turn all of mankind into demonkin. I won't allow you to taint the last remnants of Humanity, Momiji!
